createClassification.name: PII
createClassification.description:
Personally Identifiable Information information that, when used alone or with other relevant data, can identify an individual.

_Note to Legal - This tag category is provided as a starting point. Please review and update the tags based on your company policy. Also, add a reference to your PII policy document in this description._

createTags.name: NonSensitive
createTags.description: PII which is easily accessible from public sources and can include zip code, race, gender, and date of birth.

createTags.name: Sensitive
createTags.description: PII which if lost, compromised, or disclosed without authorization, could result in substantial harm, embarrassment, inconvenience, or unfairness to an individual.
